author: hwright
msg: (walker_helper): Followup to r39039: don't hide "hidden" nodes.  We let
callers make that determination for themselves.

author: hwright
msg: Add some color to the test output, to help visually offset the failures.
(TestHarness): Output colors for success and FAILURE.

author: hwright
msg: (TestHarness): Vertically align the output of the test suite when run
from the commandline.  This makes detecting FAILUREs a bit easier.

author: hwright

(invalidate_wc_props): Call the new node walking function, and drop the

author: hwright
msg: (set_wc_prop): Remove the need for an intermediate variable.
